types:type.name: GetAllUsers
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type GetAllUsers = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, first: String, last: String, department: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Martin\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"}]"}
